Package org.hibernate.sql.ast.produce

This package defines support for producing an SQL AST tree (org.hibernate.sql.ast.tree), as well as 2 implementations of suh tree generation: Query sources (HQL, Criteria, etc) which produce SQL AST trees based on an SQM tree.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SqlAstCreationLogger  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConversionException
    Represents a problem in the converter itself (Hibernate bug) during conversion of a SQM into SQL interpretation

    This differs from syntax problems in the query which is reported as SyntaxException.
    IllegalJoinSpecificationException
    Indicates a problem in the definition of a TableReferenceJoin
    SqlTreeException
    Base exception type for problems building the SQL tree.
    SyntaxException
    Represents a problem in the SQM in terms of improper syntax used.

Package org.hibernate.sql.ast.produce Description

This package defines support for producing an SQL AST tree (org.hibernate.sql.ast.tree), as well as 2 implementations of suh tree generation:
  • Query sources (HQL, Criteria, etc) which produce SQL AST trees based on an SQM tree. See org.hibernate.sql.ast.produce.sqm
  • Persister-based load, remove, etc handling which directly produces

In either case, persisters are responsible for generating the various SQL AST sub-trees such as its contributions to a QuerySpec's FROM clause, SELECT clause, etc. It was decided to have persisters directly produce SQL AST trees in handling _Persister-based load, remove, etc calls_ because:

  • It already knows how to generate the necessary sub-trees.
  • Is more performant than generation the SQM view and then walking that SQM.
